thread.title: Justin Bieber Reportedly Calls BS on Selena Gomez and The Weeknd's 'Relationship'
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Reportedly Calls BS on Selena Gomez and The Weeknd's 'Relationship'

author: Trace William Cowen
title: Justin Bieber Reportedly Calls BS on Selena Gomez and The Weeknd's 'Relationship'
text:
The Weeknd Snapped Kissing Selena Gomez, May or May Not Be Dating and Fans Are Freaking Out This alleged coupling was first whispered about when photos popped up last week of the two putting their mouths on each other. "It was a romantic dinner date in the rain," a self-proclaimed "onlooker" told People of Gomez and The Weeknd's Giorgio Baldi excursion. "They acted like a couple. They ordered pasta and shared the food. She seemed very into him. She was smiling a lot. They left holding hands." Hours after those post-pasta photos rocked insistent Twitter scrollers to their core, celebrated photographer Mert Alas posted the following mirror shot of Gomez while strategically tagging The Weeknd in the comments: 
SELENA GOMEZ IS SLAYINGG!!! pic.twitter.com/kub2n2ggqA — Bitch Problems! (@FemaleTexts) January 12, 2017 And just as news of his Gomez and Weeknd theory swept the planet Tuesday, Bieber ignored it all and instead revealed his "I love you face" on Twitter and not Instagram because Instagram is where Mr. Lucifer lives or whatever : 
My I love you face pic.twitter.com/FjDaOjinwE — Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) January 16, 2017 Tags:
